sentences.en: A single isolated force is therefore an impossibility.
sentences.cn: 所以单独的孤立的力是不存在的.

sentences.en: After all, there does not seem to be any inherent impossibility in the combination.
sentences.cn: 毕竟，在这种组合中似乎没有任何固有的不可能性。

sentences.en: Attack your impossibility complex and attach yourself to possibility thinkers.
sentences.cn: 打破不可能的联合体,并向可能性思考家靠拢.

sentences.en: Faith and fury first attack the impossibility of believing; they attack signs.
sentences.cn: 信心跟愤怒攻击信仰的不可能性.

sentences.en: He hinted at the impossibility of winding up the work in two months.
sentences.cn: 他暗示要在两个月内结束这项工作是不可能的.

sentences.en: I, frankly, find this concept a near impossibility for the company to accomplish at present.
sentences.cn: 说实话，我觉得这个理念是现在微软几乎不可能实现的了的。

sentences.en: Impossibility of performance does not excuse a man from his contract.
sentences.cn: 人不能因无法履行合同而免去责任.

sentences.en: Impossibility of using the delta, para and surf if we are morphed.
sentences.cn: 当被变形后将不能使用滑翔翼, 降落伞和冲浪板.

sentences.en: In short, the impossibility is a logical impossiblity.
sentences.cn: 简言之, 这种不可能性是逻辑的不可能性.

sentences.en: It is a physical impossibility to be in two places at once.
sentences.cn: 同时身处两地在自然法则上是不可能的.

sentences.en: It is an impossibility for you to do so.
sentences.cn: 你那样做是不可能的事.

sentences.en: It was fostered by the demands of creditors and the impossibility of holding up many more.
sentences.cn: 债权人催着要钱,又不可能再往下拖了,于是就有了这个念头.

sentences.en: It's a physical impossibility to be in two places at one time.
sentences.cn: 同时在两地是自然规律上不可能的事.

sentences.en: Obviously, given that impossibility, we have to do the next best thing.
sentences.cn: 明显地，考虑到那是不可能的，我们必须做好下一个事情。

sentences.en: Red ached dully as he realized the impossibility of ever seeing that man's face.
sentences.cn: 雷德心里真有些惆怅,那人脸上的神气他是永远也看不到的了.

sentences.en: She gently explained the impossibility of a marriage between us.
sentences.cn: 她有礼貌地解释了我们不能结婚的原因.

sentences.en: We are forced to admit the impossibility of further enquiry.
sentences.cn: 我们被迫承认不可能进一步探索.

sentences.en: We soon saw the impossibility of reaching the city before midnight.
sentences.cn: 不多久我们便意识到半夜前抵达那个城市是不可能的.

words.tran_cn: 不可能的；不可能存在的；难以忍受的；不真实的
不可能地；难以置信地；无法可想地

trans.tran_cn: 不可能（性），不可能的事（情况）
